guild.description:
For memes and shitposting about everything that happens in our beloved "Official Ruqqus Discord"
 
---

## Posting Rules


Rule 1: 

This guild is for shitposting about people/events in the Ruqqus Discord server. Any post that is not related to this will be kicked to +general. If you need help regarding the discord server, +askruqqus, +general, or +hub would gladly accept your questions.


Rule 2:

No spamming. Spamming would be considered any of the following:

* Same-format posting within a day

* Same-content posting within a day (Same content, different format)


Spammed posts will get kicked and repeated offenses results in being exiled.


Rule 3: 

No reposts: reposts are cringe. Any reposts will be kicked.

For memes and shitposting about everything that happens in our beloved "Official Ruqqus Discord"

Rule 2:

  • Same-format posting within a day

  • Same-content posting within a day (Same content, different format)

Spammed posts will get kicked and repeated offenses results in being exiled.

Rule 3:

No reposts: reposts are cringe. Any reposts will be kicked.

Rule 1:

This guild is for shitposting about people/events in the Ruqqus Discord server. Any post that is not related to this will be kicked to +general. If you need help regarding the discord server, +AskRuqqus, +general, or +Hub would gladly accept your questions.

Rule 2:

No spamming. Spamming would be considered any of the following:

  • Same-format posting within a day

  • Same-content posting within a day (Same content, different format)

Spammed posts will get kicked and repeated offenses results in being exiled.

Rule 3:

No reposts: reposts are cringe. Any reposts will be kicked.
guild.name: RuqqusDiscord

guild.description:
For memes and shitposting about everything that happens in our beloved "Official Ruqqus Discord"
 
---

## Posting Rules


Rule 1: 

This guild is for shitposting about people/events in the Ruqqus Discord server. Any post that is not related to this will be kicked to +general. If you need help regarding the discord server, +askruqqus, +general, or +hub would gladly accept your questions.


Rule 2:

No spamming. Spamming would be considered any of the following:

* Same-format posting within a day

* Same-content posting within a day (Same content, different format)


Spammed posts will get kicked and repeated offenses results in being exiled.


Rule 3: 

No reposts: reposts are cringe. Any reposts will be kicked.
